_json.gridTitle: cashew chikki | cashew nut chikki | cashew nut brittle | kaju chikki
_json.description: Making the perfect chikki is an art that requires a bit of practice to master, but it is totally worth the effort because the crispness and rich flavour of homemade chikki is much superior to any store-bought one. Plus, when you make the chikkis at home, you can use a blend of different nuts in the proportion that you wish.    Here is a detailed step-by-step recipe that shows you how to make Cashew Chikki at home. Keep all the required items ready on the kitchen platform before you begin ...
